document.full_text: australian open champion novak djokovic, rafa nadal and roger federer reached the quarter-finals at indian wells on wednesday without dropping a set while eighth-seeded andy roddick bowed out.
document.title: men's top seeds march on as andy roddick bows out
lines_and_colors: australian open champion novak djokovic, rafa nadal and roger federer reached the quarter-finals at indian wells on wednesday without dropping a set while eighth-seeded andy roddick bowed out.
